posts.title: Wingman Shot Glass
posts.content: Leave no man behind when you and your best pal hit up the local watering holes armed with the wingman shot glass. Whether your buddy wants to or not, they’re sharing in your legendary night of inebriation as they are forced to match you shot for shot.

posts.title: Shoe Deodorizer/Sanitizer/Dryer
posts.content: Make your home a more habitable place by sticking your kicks inside this shoe deodorizer/sanitizer/dryer. Simply place your stinky shoes inside the device and it will kill up to 99% of bacteria and viruses without the damaging effects of chemicals.

posts.title: Corn Dog Maker
posts.content: Make your own corn dogs from home in only six minutes with this fun and easy to use corn dog maker. With an easy to clean design and a recipe book included, you’ll be going through corn dogs and other foods on a stick in no time. Your arteries will not thank us later.

posts.title: Dinosaur Cake Mold
posts.content: Start your own edible Jurassic Park by bringing the dinos back from extinction with these dinosaur cake molds. The molds lets you create small 3D dinosaurs that can be garnished with any toppings you desire to create delicious and professional looking snacks.

posts.title: Wine-Opoly Board Game
posts.content: Become a wine connoisseur during family game night by sitting down for a rousing board game of Wine-Opoly. Instead of properties, players buy prized wines, collect bunches of grapes, and trade them in for decanters.

posts.title: Unfolding Book Furniture
posts.content: Create a comfy place to sit or lay your things down by fanning out one of these bookniture pieces. The clever accordion-like design allows you to quickly pop them open to use as a surprisingly sturdy chair, or as a short statured desk.

posts.title: Mini Arcade Machine
posts.content: Kick it old school by gaming ’80s style with this mini arcade machine. Although this pint sized arcade is small in size, it more than makes up for it with 240 super fun games that you play using the small joystick and buttons on the tiny dashboard.

posts.title: Star Wars Ewok Dog Costume
posts.content: Get your four legged family member in on the fun this Halloween season by dressing him up in the Star Wars Ewok dog costume. This adorable costume transforms your small breed pooch into your very own lovable tiny Ewok.

posts.title: Mosaic Tile Wall Sticker
posts.content: Spice up your bathroom’s bland decor with a little Mediterranean flair using these mosaic tile wall stickers. Each 6cm x 6cm square features a colorful pattern that can be adhered to a variety of surfaces, and can be easily removed without leaving a mark.

posts.title: Ultimate Hangover Cure
posts.content: Sit back and drink like there’s no tomorrow because you’ve got the ultimate hangover cure by your side. While homemade “cures” taste like manure and yield no results, this solution contains up to 3 times the electrolytes of sports drinks so you can recover faster.

posts.title: Picture Printing Smartphone Case
posts.content: Transform your phone into a Polaroid-like camera instantly with this picture printing smartphone case. Once hooked up to your mobile device, any photo you snap with your camera can be printed out into a tangible picture you can share with family and friends.

posts.title: Miniature Interactive Chewbacca
posts.content: The galaxy’s greatest sidekick is here to keep your little intergalactic smuggler entertained for hours on end. This pint-sized plush Wookie comes with a perfectly gelled and luxurious mane and can respond with over 100 sound and motion combinations.
